comments.body: Are there any properties that this paragraph is expected to have for the benchmark to be effective, e.g. does it need to be multi-line? A comment might help in the future.

These are just basic benchmarks I wrote to quickly verify that the new `RawRecorder` is working as intended. In a follow up PR, I'm preparing a real set of benchmarks covering single-line, multi-line, rich text, maxLines, ellipsis, etc.

The doc comment is the same as the one for the above class. I think it should have more specific details about what it is trying to measure and how.

(this comment also applies to the class above)
